content.en: Cloud service optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the selection of cloud computing services. These algorithms, such as the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP), Fuzzy Analytic Hierarchy Process (FAHP), and Quality function deployment, are used to evaluate and rank different cloud service options based on criteria like quality of service, trust level, and user preferences. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to optimize cloud service selection and resource allocation in order to provide efficient and reliable cloud computing experiences.
content.da: Optimering af cloud-service: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre udvælgelsen af cloud computing-tjenester. Disse algoritmer, såsom Analytisk Hierarki Proces (AHP), Fuzzy Analytisk Hierarki Proces (FAHP), og Kvalitetsfunktion implementering, bruges til at evaluere og rangere forskellige cloud-service muligheder baseret på kriterier som tjenestekvalitet, tillidniveau og brugerpræferencer. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at optimere udvælgelsen af cloud-tjenester og ressourceallokering for at tilbyde effektive og pålidelige cloud computing-oplevelser.
